# jkiimala.github.io llms.txt

> Showcase a portfolio of web development, digital skills, AI tools, and educational resources for training and project collaboration across various disciplines and industries.

- [Space Worms Game](https://jkiimala.github.io/spaceWorms): Play a simple two-player worm game with keyboard controls and scoring.
- [Sikanoppa Peliohjeet](https://jkiimala.github.io/sikanoppa): Explain rules and gameplay for Sikanoppa dice game variations.
- [Beer Clicker Instructions](https://jkiimala.github.io/beerClicker): Provide instructions for playing the Beer Clicker game.
- [Professional Portfolio](https://jkiimala.github.io): Showcases an individual's educational background, skills, work experience, projects, and contact information.
- [Captain Jackpot Slot](https://jkiimala.github.io/captainJackpot): Interactive online slot game featuring pirate-themed symbols and betting options.
- [Industrial Engineer Portfolio](https://jkiimala.github.io/industrialEngineer): Showcase industrial engineering expertise combined with web development for digital transformation projects and collaborations.
